comment: Smart, and she wants you to know it. You better get it the first time, because she will not answer questions.  Very inflexible.  Conferencing.  She also made multiple errors on test questions and then would not allow students to view their exams.
Unlike most of the professors in nursing at this school, Dr. White is extremely supportive and helpful to students and does not exhibit the typical condescending nursing instructor attitude.
Very passionate about nursing and has a genuine interest in the students and the outcome of the class.
Very nice. Not condescending like some of the other nursing facculty. Read the book and practice with your lab partner.
